Dewboy.. your animorph Idea... IMO is dumb... It would just be useless to 
have them come in since animorphs are not in any way affiliated with 
Transformers aside from their cards saying Transformers. ALthough a Hork 
Bajir with a robot mode instead of the cantuarish mode it has would be cool. 
THats like the only good Animorph toy I have.

--part1_89.f4e32b3.292e73e2_boundary
